alert.note: Alert for Attala; Choctaw; Leake; Neshoba; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 10:01PM CDT until September 06 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Choctaw County in central Mississippi... Northern Leake County in central Mississippi... Attala County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Winston County in east central Mississippi... Northwestern Neshoba County in east central Mississippi... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1000 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ethel, or 7 miles east of Kosciusko, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Zama and Smyrna around 1005 PM CDT. Singleton and Renfroe around 1010 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
